response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it's worth $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic worth but also the unique benefits and advantages it offers to you. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns and enhance your business operations. Please let us know if you require any further information or clarification. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
